title: What $400,000 can buy you in Hunterdon County, Aug. 25 to 31
description: Prospective homebuyers considering the real estate market had a range of options in various neighborhoods throughout the region between Aug. 25 and Aug. 31. In this article, we outline recent property sales in Hunterdon County, all of which featured homes under $400,000.
content:
Prospective homebuyers considering the real estate market had a range of options in various neighborhoods throughout the region between Aug. 25 and Aug. 31. In this article, we outline recent property sales in Hunterdon County, all of which featured homes under $400,000.

Here, we provide a breakdown of the top 10 properties in each area, selected based on their proximity to the desired price range and the most spacious living areas available.

Please note that the properties in the list below are for real estate sales where the title was recorded during the week of Aug. 25, even if the property may have been sold earlier.
summary: The article discusses recent property sales in Hunterdon County, including those of the past and future, as well as current occupants. The article also provides a breakdown of the top 10 properties in each area, selected based on their proximity to the desired price range and the most spacious living areas.
shortSummary: The article discusses recent property sales in Hunterdon, highlighting top 10 most attractive options for sale under $400,000, with potential for future generations.

Two public buildings in New Jersey have been named among the 100 ugliest in the United States..
The Atlantic City Municipal Court ranked seventh, and the Passaic County Administration Building ranked 25th in a survey by The Robert Dekanski Team at Re/Max 1st Advantage.
